title: 2004/549/EC: Council Decision of 12 July 2004 appointing a new member of the Commission of the European Communities
header:
16.7.2004 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 244/50
COUNCIL DECISION
of 12 July 2004
appointing a new member of the Commission of the European Communities
(2004/549/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular the second paragraph of Article 215 thereof,
Whereas:
main_body: Mr Olli REHN is hereby appointed a member of the Commission for the period from 12 July 2004 to 31 October 2004.
This Decision shall take effect on 12 July 2004.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Union.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 2004.
For the Council
The President
B. BOT
